      • setVmStdRef

        protected void setVmStdRef(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Add some standard references to the vm context. Details:

        The tool name (toolName is used to establish the HTML page title (see #macro (chef_start) in VM_chef_library.vm).

        We set the tool name to reflect the editor integration search window.

        Overrides:
        setVmStdRef in class VelocityPortletPaneledAction
        Parameters:
        request - The render request.
        response - The render response.
        See Also:
        VmServlet.setVmStdRef(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
